name: Return the Account Ledger for an NSC and Account with cache

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930460120000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for a ledger with values:
| nsc | account | pageSize | pageNumber | refresh | maxOverallRows |
| 931292 | 25921068 | 3 | 0 | true | 100 |

children.description: Get ledger: | nsc | account | pageSize | pageNumber | refresh | maxOverallRows | | 931292 | 25921068 | 3 | 0 | true | 100 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following ledger transactions should be returned
| date | narrative | amountvalue | amountsign | runningBalancevalue | runningBalancesign |
| 2015-04-07 | Interest Rate |  |  |  |  |
|  | Credit  @  0.050% |  |  | 7130.79 | Cr |
| 2015-01-29 | INTEREST ALLOWED | 0.05 | Cr |  |  |

children.description: Validate account ledger response: | date | narrative | amountvalue | amountsign | runningBalancevalue | runningBalancesign | | 2015-04-07 | Interest Rate | | | | | | | Credit @ 0.050% | | | 7130.79 | Cr | | 2015-01-29 | INTEREST ALLOWED | 0.05 | Cr | | |

title: Return the Account Ledger for an NSC and Account with cache
